mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT N.NEWS_AFTER_ADOPTION_NO , N.MEMBER_NO , N.IMAGE_NO , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , N.ENROLL_DATE , N.MODIFY_DATE , N.DEL_YN , I.IMAGE_PATH , M.NICK AS WRITER_NICK FROM NEWS_AFTER_ADOPTION N JOIN IMAGE I ON I.IMAGE_NO = N.IMAGE_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = N.MEMBER_NO WHERE N.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NEWS_AFTER_ADOPTION_NO DESC ) T )
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM NEWS_AFTER_ADOPTION WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT N.NEWS_AFTER_ADOPTION_NO , N.MEMBER_NO , N.IMAGE_NO , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(N.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE , TO_CHAR(N.MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS MODIFY_DATE , N.DEL_YN , I.IMAGE_PATH , M.NICK AS WRITER_NICK FROM NEWS_AFTER_ADOPTION N JOIN IMAGE I ON I.IMAGE_NO = N.IMAGE_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = N.MEMBER_NO WHERE N.DEL_YN = 'N' AND N.NEWS_AFTER_ADOPTION_NO = #{newsAfterAdoptionNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE NEWS_AFTER_ADOPTION SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE NEWS_AFTER_ADOPTION_NO = #{newsAfterAdoptionNo}
